roleset.name: burp, a little noise coming from the heart, belching
roleset.note: BURP-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire (from burp.01-v)

role.descr: cognate object, description of type of burp itself

example.name: All arguments
example.text: He burped a contented burp, slid into bed and fell soundly to sleep.

example.name: Wow unpleasant. All args.
example.text: When the patient was admitted, she was burping up dark brown bile, but suddenly, this has escalated into intense projectile vomiting.

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: His burping the national anthem surprisingly did little to impress Ben's new girlfriend's father, an Admiral in the Navy.
